channel.title: Help with npc drops
channel.description:
Can somone help me out and show me how to edit the npc drops. Im hav Bing a problem with Jad I ONLY want him to drop firecapes. But when I went to the npc drops notepad thing (sorry im new with coding) it had party hat's etc. I deleted everything besides the firecape but he's still dropping rares etc. If you can help let me know.
thanks

item.title: Help with npc drops
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

And npc drops may not be controlled by a cfg file. There are tuts on adding npc drops without one if you wanna look at it so you know what to look for. ;]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with npc drops
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

NPCDropgs is a configuration and doesnt require compiling.

It does however, require restarting.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with npc drops
item.dc:creator: @watch_range watch range
item.description:
@watch_range wrote:

Did you save it, then compile and restart it?

Read full topic
